info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 27 at 2:36PM EST until November 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 11 inches possible.
* WHERE...Ottawa and Muskegon Counties.
* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday morning through Sunday morning.
* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes. Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Visibility and road conditions may change rapidly over short distances in lake effect snow.
info.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
During lake effect snow, the weather can vary from bands of locally heavy snow to dry weather just a few miles away. Visibilities can also vary greatly. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather, visibility, and road conditions.

parameter.value: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
